tier.item: kutirkUchir] huk umallantashi chunka ishkayta yupaykun.
`Then the cat, repeatedly removing the head from the saddlebag and
returning it, counts the one head twelve times.' (Weber 1989:323)1
kutirkUchir] huk umallantashi chunka ishkayta yupaykun.
`Then the cat, repeatedly removing the head from the saddlebag and
returning it, counts the one head twelve times.' (Weber 1989:323)1
Chawra mishi alpurhapita [horqorkur kutirkUchir] [horqorkur kutirkUchir] huk umallantashi chunka ishkayta yupaykun.
Then the cat, repeatedly removing the head from the saddlebag and returning it, counts the one head twelve times.'(Weber 1989:323)1

tier.item: b. Odeceb fojen. Rum oso eu fojen. Ihoc leceb haun rum oso na li fojen.
Ihoc leceb haun rum oso na li fojen. Ihoc leceb oso na ha li ihoc leceb
haun jo oso na toni nu lena. Fojen. Ihoc leceb jo oso na toni nu len eu na
fojen ihoc len. Rum cunug ca foji hedon. Odimei madon, "Quila qa ihoc,"
`Then she vomited. She vomited in that room. Then after she had filled
that room with vomit she went to another room and filled that with vomit
and then filled another room with vomit. Then she went down and went to
another house. She vomited there. She filled all those rooms with vomit.
Then she finished vomiting and said to him, "Now that is enough."'
b. Odeceb fojen. Rum oso eu fojen. Ihoc leceb haun rum oso na li fojen.
Ihoc leceb haun rum oso na li fojen. Ihoc leceb oso na ha li ihoc leceb
haun jo oso na toni nu lena. Fojen. Ihoc leceb jo oso na toni nu len eu na
fojen ihoc len. Rum cunug ca foji hedon. Odimei madon, "Quila qa ihoc,"
`Then she vomited. She vomited in that room. Then after she had filled
that room with vomit she went to another room and filled that with vomit
and then filled another room with vomit. Then she went down and went to
another house. She vomited there. She filled all those rooms with vomit.
Then she finished vomiting and said to him, "Now that is enough."'

Odeceb fojen. Rum oso eu fojen. Ihoc leceb haun rum oso na li fojen. Ihoc leceb haun rum oso na li fojen. Ihoc leceb oso na ha li ihoc leceb haun jo oso na toni nu lena. Fojen. Ihoc leceb jo oso na toni nu len eu na fojen ihoc len. Rum cunug ca foji hedon. Odimei madon, "Quila qa ihoc," don.

Then she vomited. She vomited in that room. Then after she had filled that room with vomit she went to another room and filled that with vomit and then filled another room with vomit. Then she went down and went to another house. She vomited there. She filled all those rooms with vomit. Then she finished vomiting and said to him,"Now that is enough."
